I had a great feeling about this movie, but after watching it, it was a big disappointment.

It was pure garbage! I mean the few things I love about the movie was the story, costumes and make ups. They truly shine like the video game.

One thing that makes up for this movie is the fighting as I love martial arts so much.

But character development is total trash and fuel with bad acting just makes this movie suck so bad. No wonder why Tekken producer said the movie was garbage. The character development and story for them just ruined the whole movie.

This is a disgrace to the game version.

Here is my rate: (Out of 10)
Audio= 8
Video= 9
Movie= 5
